import { useContext } from "react" import Global from "../../context/Global" import { PostType } from "../../types/Interfaces" import { Card } from "react-bootstrap" import classes from './Post.module.css' const Post = ({postId, postTitle, postBody, authorLogin}: PostType) => { const {localStore} = useContext(Global) return (

{authorLogin}

 {postTitle} ) } export default Post
